page.title: 20End of Term
page.content: This contribution has been made by members of P7 class of Olderfleet Primary School. This is our last week together, for next term our members will be going to at least four different secondary schools. As a final celebration of life in Olderfleet, we invited our parents to a reception in the school hall. Sixty two people were entertained to a buffet meal which was prepared and served by the class members. The meal comprised chicken and ham with various salads and dressings, trifle, coffee and grape juice to drink. The entertainment was based on the television chat show 'Wogan', and the guests were members of staff, impersonated by the boys in the class.
